title.rendered: Market Leader Now Part of Constellation Software, Inc.

content.rendered:
We are excited to announce that the purchase of Market Leader by Constellation Software, Inc. is now complete.

This change allows us to focus on our customers and continue to improve and innovate on our products, bringing you the best tools in the industry. We will be investing in our core products: Market Leader CRM products, SharperAgent, and our leads offerings to helping customers grow and manage their businesses.

Watch a video from our General Manager, Scott Smith

A word from Constellation Software, Inc.

“Software and web technologies are our primary focus and we’re proud of our proven track record in product development and customer support.  We’ll leverage this expertise to enrich Market Leader for the benefit of its important clients in the real estate industry.”

Tom George
Vice President
Constellation Software Inc., Perseus Operating Group
